alert.note: Alert for Fannin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fannin County through 630 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonham State Park, or 9 miles southeast of Bonham, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Honey Grove, Dodd City, Bonham State Park, Ladonia, Bailey, Pecan Gap, Windom, Dial, Bug Tussle, Gober, and Cotton Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
